SKT_FIRST.name: E Vroom Vroom Dead
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to activate a <color=#28d9ed>Dual Attack</color> from the ally with the highest Attack.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。\n攻撃後、攻撃力が最も高い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>連携</color>を発生させる。
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다.\n공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 가장 공격력이 높은 아군의 <color=#28d9ed>협공</color>을 발생시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_zh: 攻击敌人。\n攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>的几率使攻击力最高的友军发动<color=#28d9ed>夹攻</color>。

SKT_SECOND.name: Chainsaw Girl
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) When Mero's Health is healed, reduces the cooldown of <color=#28d9ed>Chainsaw Girl</color> by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>. (Activated at the end of an ally's turn)\n\n(Active Effect) Attacks all enemies and grants <color=#28d9ed>Lifesteal</color> to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)【メロ】のHPが回復した場合、<color=#28d9ed>【チェーンソーガール】</color>のスキルターンが<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少する。(味方のターン終了時に発動)\n\n(アクティブ効果)敵全体にダメージを与え、味方全体に<color=#28d9ed>吸収</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 메로의 체력이 회복될 시 <color=#28d9ed>전기톱 Girl</color>의 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다. (아군 팀 턴 종료 시 발동)\n\n(액티브 효과) 적 전체를 공격하고 아군 전체에게 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>흡혈</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_zh: (被动效果)梅罗的生命值恢复完成时,<color=#28d9ed>电锯少女</color>的冷却时间减少<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。(友军回合结束时发动)\n\n(主动效果)攻击全体敌人,并使全体友军获得<color=#28d9ed>吸血</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

5_jp: 自分の強化効果ターン+1ターン
5_zh: 自身强化效果持续时间+1回合

SKT_BURST_1.effect_zh: 回避降低+2回合 (所有目标)

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Changes to Enhanced Skill\nEnhanced Evasion Reduction (Ignores Resilience)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 強化スキルに変更\n回避DOWN強化\n(対象の効果抵抗を無視する)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_kr: 강화 스킬로 교체\n회피 감소 강화 (저항 무시)
SKT_BURST_3.effect_zh: 转化为强化技能\n回避降低强化 (无视抵抗)

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Mirsha Massacre
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance each to increase all allies' <color=#28d9ed>Accuracy</color> and <color=#28d9ed>Attack</color> for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nAfter attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance to grant <color=#28d9ed>Immortality</color> to the caster for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: それぞれ<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>と<color=#28d9ed>攻撃力</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間UPさせた後、 敵全体にダメージを与える。\n攻撃後、自分に<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>명중</color>과 <color=#28d9ed>공격력</color>을 각각 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 증가시킨 후 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 자신에게 <color=#28d9ed>불사</color>를 부여합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_zh: 全体友军各有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率获得<color=#28d9ed>命中</color>和<color=#28d9ed>攻击力</color>提升效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>,随后攻击全体敌人。\n攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>80%</color>的几率使自身获得<color=#28d9ed>不死</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>1回合</color>。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, inflicts <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to inflict <color=#28d9ed>Marked</color> on the target for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color>:攻撃後、対象単体に<color=#28d9ed>標的</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、対象に<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>標的</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상 한 명에게 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>표식</color>을 부여합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 대상 한 명에게 <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>의 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 <color=#28d9ed>표식</color>을 부여합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_zh: <color=#ffd732>连携技能自由顺序效果</color>:攻击后,对1名目标造成<color=#28d9ed>标记</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。\n\n<color=#ffd732>夹攻效果</color>:攻击后,有<color=#28d9ed>70%</color>的几率对1名目标造成<color=#28d9ed>标记</color>效果,持续<color=#28d9ed>2回合</color>。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
